snippet: Alex Anthopoulos left the team on Thursday, the day he was selected executive of the year, rejecting an offer to remain in an uncertain role under Mark Shapiro.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Toronto Blue Jays announce that general manager Alex Anthopoulos is leaving organization; other hirings and firings around MLB noted.
lead_paragraph: Alex Anthopoulos left the team on Thursday, the day he was selected executive of the year, rejecting an offer to remain in an uncertain role under Mark Shapiro.

headline.print_headline: A Torrent of Changes in Dugouts and Offices
headline.main: With New President Coming In, Blue Jays’ General Manager Departs
